channel.title: Someone please help! I'm new to RSPS's! [WILLING TO PAY]
channel.description:
Hello, I am new to rsps's. I am indeed trying to make my own server, but need the professionals help.. If there are any people that know how to make/code/design a server, I have a job for you...
Problem #1) I downloaded a server & client (AbbyScape, to be exact) from one of the server download pages on Moparscape forums, and also Downloaded JDK 19. I edited the "Build" files, and updated it to my JDK program number (which is 19). After I saved the file, I double clicked it and saw that it gave me this error: "The system cannot find the path specified".. What do I need to do next? Please fix my problem..
Issue #2) I have the AbbyScape server & client downloaded, I need some places edited, and I need ANTI-DUPE, as well as new custom items installed. I am looking for GFX'ers, and a Coder who can settle this issue (If you are a GFX'er and a Coder, that is excellent!)
If you can fix these problems, I will make you an admin on my server, and will give you 40% of all profits to you. I will pay for all the advertising, and setting up the forums, and its costs.
This is an easy way to make some quick cash, if you just help out 2-4 hours a week or so.. :P
Please get back to me as soon as possible, thanks!

how do i fix it?
